Title: Rock Bottom
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Jason Ning (written for television by)
Actors: Thomas Jane, Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper
Plot: Holden's team makes an uneasy alliance with Fred Johnson while Miller fights for his life against Anderson Dawe's thugs.
